summary: Siemens AG is a huge German company that makes technology for many different industries. It's like a giant group of companies all working together. Started way back in 1847, it's now one of the biggest industrial companies in Europe. Siemens makes things that help with electricity, trains, and even medical equipment. They have lots of different parts to their business, and they employ tens of thousands of people all over the world. It's a very important company in Germany and in the global market.
title: Siemens
